examples.name: Default
examples.code: <rux-notification open="" status="standby" message="This is a notification banner. It wont disappear until the user dismisses it."></rux-notification>

examples.name: Default Slot
examples.code: Notification banner Link

examples.name: Prefix Slot
examples.code:
<rux-notification open="" status="standby" message="This is a notification banner. It wont disappear until the user dismisses it.">
	<rux-classification-marking classification="unclassified" tag="" slot="prefix"></rux-classification-marking>
	Notification banner
</rux-notification>

examples.name: Actions Slot
examples.code:
<rux-notification open="" status="standby" message="This is a notification banner. It wont disappear until the user dismisses it.">
Notification banner
	<rux-button slot="actions">Acknowledge</rux-button>
</rux-notification>

fields.value: This is a notification banner. It wont disappear until the user dismisses it.

fields.note: Prevents the user from dismissing the notification

examples.name: Default
examples.code:
<rux-pop-up open="true">
	<rux-icon icon="apps" slot="trigger"></rux-icon>
	<rux-menu>
		<rux-menu-item href="#">Menu Item 1</rux-menu-item>
			<rux-menu-item href="#">Menu Item 2</rux-menu-item>
			<rux-menu-item-divider></rux-menu-item-divider>
			<rux-menu-item href="#">Menu Item 3</rux-menu-item>
		</rux-menu>
	</rux-pop-up>

fields.note: The placement of the pop up relative to it's slotted trigger element.
Closes the pop-up when a single selection is made.
Turns autoUpdate on or off which makes the pop-up move to stay in view based on scroll.
Watches for trigger movements and replaces the pop-up if movement is detected.
The position strategy of the popup, either absolute or fixed.

examples.name: Default
examples.code:
<rux-segmented-button></rux-segmented-button>
<script type="module">
const segmented = document.querySelector('rux-segmented-button')
const data = [
{ label: 'First item' },
{ label: 'Second item'},
{ label: 'Third item' },
]
segmented.data = data
</script>

examples.name: Default
examples.code:
<rux-select label="Select Menu" input-id="1" label-id="1" name="default" size="medium">
	<rux-option value="" selected="" label="Select an option"></rux-option>
	<rux-option value="1.1" label="Option 1.1"></rux-option>
	<rux-option value="1.2" label="Option 1.2"></rux-option>
	<rux-option value="1.3" label="Option 1.3"></rux-option>
	<rux-option value="1.4" disabled="" label="Option 1.4 (disabled)"></rux-option>
	</rux-select>

examples.name: Option Group
examples.code:
<rux-select label="With option groups" input-id="1" label-id="1" name="" size="medium">
	<rux-option value="" label="Select an option" selected=""></rux-option>
	<rux-option-group label="Group one">
		<rux-option value="1.1" label="Option 1.1"></rux-option>
			<rux-option value="1.2" label="Option 1.2"></rux-option>
			<rux-option value="1.3" label="Option 1.3"></rux-option>
			<rux-option value="1.4" label="Option 1.4"></rux-option>
			</rux-option-group>
	<rux-option-group label="Group two">
		<rux-option value="2.1" label="Option 2.1"></rux-option>
			<rux-option value="2.2" label="Option 2.2"></rux-option>
			<rux-option value="2.3" label="Option 2.3"></rux-option>
			<rux-option value="2.4" disabled="" label="Option 2.4 (disabled)"></rux-option>
			</rux-option-group>
	<rux-option value="3.1" label="Option 3.1"></rux-option>
	</rux-select>

examples.name: Status
examples.code:
<rux-tree>
	<rux-tree-node>
		<rux-status slot='prefix' status='normal'></rux-status>
Tree item 1
		<rux-tree-node slot='node'>
			<rux-status slot='prefix' status='normal'></rux-status>
				Tree item 1.1
				</rux-tree-node>
			<rux-tree-node slot='node'>
			<rux-status slot='prefix' status='normal'></rux-status>
				Tree item 1.2
			</rux-tree-node>
			<rux-tree-node slot='node'>
			<rux-status slot='prefix' status='normal'></rux-status>
				Tree item 1.3
			</rux-tree-node>
			</rux-tree-node>
		<rux-tree-node>
		<rux-status slot='prefix' status='standby'></rux-status>
			Tree item 2
			</rux-tree-node>
		<rux-tree-node>
		<rux-status slot='prefix' status='normal'></rux-status>
			Tree item 3
			<rux-tree-node slot='node'>
				<rux-status slot='prefix' status='off'></rux-status>
					Tree item 3.1
					</rux-tree-node>
				<rux-tree-node slot='node'>
				<rux-status slot='prefix' status='critical'></rux-status>
					Tree item 3.2
					</rux-tree-node>
				<rux-tree-node slot='node'>
				<rux-status slot='prefix' status='normal'></rux-status>
					Tree item 3.3
					</rux-tree-node>
				</rux-tree-node>
		<rux-tree-node>
		<rux-status slot='prefix' status='caution'></rux-status>
			Tree item 4
			<rux-tree-node slot='node'>
				<rux-status slot='prefix' status='caution'></rux-status>
					Tree item 4.1
					</rux-tree-node>
				<rux-tree-node slot='node'>
				<rux-status slot='prefix' status='normal'></rux-status>
					Tree item 4.2
					</rux-tree-node>
				</rux-tree-node>
		</rux-tree>
